### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    affiliation VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    link VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_id UUID REFERENCES researchers(id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM researchers WHERE id = '<researcher_id>'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE researchers (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	research_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE publications (
	pub_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
	author_id INT NOT NULL,
	publish_date DATE NOT NULL,
	doi VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE datasets (
	dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	dataset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	download_link VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
	publication_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
	collab_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
	collaborator_id INT NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
	resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	resource_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
	owner_id INT
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
